Reviews.Title: “Pretty Sweet”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed hacienda paradise booked package promoted hotels website note book package change stay lucky move modern spacious bed comfortable mexico enjoyed complimentary breakfast buffet style included fruit salad eggs hot cakes yogurt juice etc beach towels nice touch free pass beach club chose beach club drink prices expensive cheaper drink relax beach buy styrofoam cooler walmart pick ice beer mom pop shop dont cooler beach club allowed staff super friendly stay pleasant organic soaps shampoos courtyard surrounding pool pretty nice quiet hotel highly recommend hotel
